Welcome:
Welcome to "Doors and Levels!" 
 The rules are: each shown number is a door number.
Pick any door and write its number to the console.
You can back to the previous level by choosing door number 0 
write "exit" to the console to quit the game
SelectDoor: Please select the one of the doors numbers
PutNumber: You have entered a wrong value. Please enter a number
WrongNumber: You have entered a wrong number. Please enter one of the numbers listed
